productIdentifiers.description: ISO/IEC 15459 compliant unique product identifier in GS1 system
notes: GTIN-14 not permitted for retail point-of-sale
AI (03) not approved for retail channel including online marketplaces
Once assigned under ESPR, SHALL not be reused per GS1 standards

qualifiers.description: A subset of a specific trade item associated with a production run, e.g. a specific manufacturing plant, specific date(s) and time(s)
Unique identifier for individual product instance
An alphanumeric attribute of a GTIN assigned to a retail consumer trade item variant version for its lifetime
useCases: Product version tracking without GTIN change
notes: Pending rename from 'GTIN Version Number' to remove confusion with configuration variants
Proposed to allow AI (22) for party change notifications

qualifiers.description: Variation number for configurable products with Made-to-Order GTIN
useCases: Configurable product identification (e.g., window with specific instance)
notes: Pending deprecation of Indicator digit 9 for Custom Trade Items
Technical industries to define GTIN rules for compound GTIN within custom trade item application standard

operatorIdentifiers.description: ISO/IEC 15459 compliant unique operator identifier for economic operators
notes: Required for economic operator responsible for DPP
AI (417) used if required by delegated act within AIDC carrier

facilityIdentifiers.description: ISO/IEC 15459 compliant unique facility identifier for physical locations
facilityIdentifiers.applicationIdentifier: GLN (no specific AI for facility in data carrier)
notes: Required for facility where product was produced
Locations (e.g., building, kiosk) involved in value chain or used by actors in value chain

dataCarriers.description: 2D barcode encoding GS1 Digital Link URI in uncompressed form
advantages: Direct web content access without additional software
Supports both public and private DPP data access

dataCarriers.description: 2D barcode encoding GS1 Digital Link URI in uncompressed form

technicalSpecs.aperture: 80% of smallest X-dimension for quality measurements

dataCarriers.description: Radio-frequency identification tag encoding SGTIN EPC

technicalSpecs.encoding: SGTIN EPC corresponding to compound key of AI (01) and AI (21)
technicalSpecs.serialNumber: Must match Serial Number in associated barcode AI (21)

notes: SHALL be in addition to QR Code or Data Matrix, not as replacement
When associated barcode carries AI (21), RFID SHALL encode same Serial Number

digitalLinkFunctions.description: Full URI with brand owner domain preceding GS1 identifier enables link to public DPP information
notes: No additional software needed for consumers
Direct web content access via smartphone camera

digitalLinkFunctions.description: Structured URI allows identifier to be parsed, providing unique, persistent, granular identifier for private DPP data
digitalLinkFunctions.example: Identifier parsed from URI structure for database lookup

symbolPlacement.primaryRule: Data carrier shall be placed on the product itself
fallbackOptions: On packaging if not possible on product
symbolPlacement.lifespanConsideration: Placement should accommodate lifespan of product as specified by delegated act
symbolPlacement.multipleBarcodesRule: For multiple barcodes needed for different applications, see section 4.15.1 non-adjacent placement rule
